name: Arion Holding B.V.
goal: Arion Holding B.V. is the parent company for a range of subsidiaries that produce and sell products for the healthcare sector. Arion Holding B.V. has two main product ranges. One product range covers application aids for compression stockings, the other product range covers single-use, prepackaged wet wipes for carrying out bed baths or other personal hygiene encounters.
interests: Climate Action, Consumers, Energy, Environment, Fraud prevention, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Research and innovation, Trade
euInitiatives:
European Health policy
European Science and Technology policy
European Environment policy
